name: part_003
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Shishiro Botan perform the song 'Kokoro ga Tomaranai' on stage with a slot machine theme backdrop.
A slot machine animation sequence featuring characters from the 'Sea Story' series.
Usada Pekora, Oozora Subaru, and Houshou Marine perform a 'Sea Story' themed song on stage.

subtitles.original: 近づけるよ
subtitles.english: We can get closer.

subtitles.original: 君を見ているだけで
subtitles.english: Just by looking at you,

subtitles.original: 戦っているのよ
subtitles.english: I'm fighting.

subtitles.original: 期待はどんな時でも
subtitles.english: Expectations, at any time,

subtitles.original: もつれて迷い込む
subtitles.english: Become tangled and lost.

subtitles.original: イチかバチか夢に向かい加速する
subtitles.english: Taking a chance, accelerating towards the dream.

subtitles.original: ココロが止まらない 感じてる
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop, I'm feeling it.

subtitles.original: 悩み多き日常のターンに
subtitles.english: In the turn of a worry-filled daily life,

subtitles.original: 君といる時の自分が一番好きだよ
subtitles.english: I like myself best when I'm with you.

subtitles.original: ココロは止まらない 光の中
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop, in the middle of the light.

subtitles.original: 七色の水しぶきあげて
subtitles.english: Kicking up rainbow-colored water sprays,

subtitles.original: 新しい明日の風に向かい走り出そうよ
subtitles.english: Let's start running towards the wind of a new tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 二人きりで
subtitles.english: Just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 会いたい気持ちが
subtitles.english: The feeling of wanting to see you

subtitles.original: ため息に溶けてゆく
subtitles.english: Dissolves into a sigh.

subtitles.original: 寂しいよ
subtitles.english: It's lonely.

subtitles.original: すぐそばにいてくれた
subtitles.english: You were right by my side,

subtitles.original: 泣き出しそうになった時
subtitles.english: When I felt like I was about to burst into tears.

subtitles.original: 気づかないふりしてくれたね
subtitles.english: You pretended not to notice, didn't you?

subtitles.original: 重ねる唇から
subtitles.english: From our overlapping lips,

subtitles.original: こぼれる切なさも愛しさも
subtitles.english: Both sadness and love overflow.

subtitles.original: ココロが止まらない 感じてる
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop, I'm feeling it.

subtitles.original: もっとすべてを叶えてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try to make everything come true.

subtitles.original: 願った奇跡がこんなにも近くにあったよ
subtitles.english: The miracle I wished for was so close all along.

subtitles.original: ココロは止まらない 通り過ぎた
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop, the scent of summer

subtitles.original: 夏の匂い懐かしいね
subtitles.english: Passing by is so nostalgic.

subtitles.original: 君を好きになってから前より寂しがり屋に
subtitles.english: Since I fell in love with you, I've become lonelier than before.

subtitles.original: なってしまった
subtitles.english: That's what happened.

subtitles.original: こわいものはたったひとつ
subtitles.english: There's only one thing I'm afraid of.

subtitles.original: 君が優しすぎること
subtitles.english: It's that you're too kind.

subtitles.original: 例えそれが風のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Even if it's just a trick of the wind,

subtitles.original: 夢へのブレーキがかからない
subtitles.english: There's no brake on this dream.

subtitles.original: ココロが止まらない 感じてる
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop, I'm feeling it.

subtitles.original: きっと答えはひとつじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm sure there's not just one answer.

subtitles.original: 君に会うためだけにとても優しくなれるよ
subtitles.english: Just to meet you, I can become very kind.

subtitles.original: ココロは止まらない 月の雫
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop, the moon's droplets,

subtitles.original: ずっと君を探してた
subtitles.english: I was searching for you all along.

subtitles.original: 同じ時 同じ星 見上げて このままずっと
subtitles.english: Looking up at the same star, at the same time, forever like this,

subtitles.original: 色あせぬように
subtitles.english: So that it never fades.

subtitles.original: リーチ
subtitles.english: Reach!

subtitles.original: 輝くマリンブルー
subtitles.english: Shining Marine Blue.

subtitles.original: やっと出会ったサマータイム
subtitles.english: Finally encountered summertime.

subtitles.original: ミラクルマリンパワー
subtitles.english: Miracle Marine Power.

subtitles.original: せーので飛び込もう！
subtitles.english: Let's jump in together!

subtitles.original: Go! Go!
subtitles.english: Go! Go!

subtitles.original: Let's Go!
subtitles.english: Let's Go!

subtitles.original: SEA STORY
subtitles.english: SEA STORY
